DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , placebo-controlled , double-masked , Phase 2b/Phase 3 study assess efficacy two different concentration XAF5 Ointment reduction lower lid steatoblepharon ( undereye bag ) .
DOC.brief_title: Phase 2b/3 Study XAF5 Ointment Steatoblepharon ( Undereye Bags )
DOC.criteria: Moderate severe , bilateral low eyelid steatoblepharon Must understand provide inform consent Healthy facial skin Pregnant lactate woman Clinically significant eye disease Best correct visual acuity worse 20/40 either eye History eye surgery past 6 month History low eyelid surgery
